title: Spear Phishing
content: Personalized scams using your role, projects, or social media info to appear legitimate.

title: Business Email Compromise (BEC)
content: Exec/vendor impersonation requesting urgent wire transfers or sensitive data.

title: Credential Harvesting
content: Fake login portals mimic brands. Always navigate directly to the official site/app.

title: Malicious Attachments
content: Macro-enabled docs, HTML attachments, or links to drive-by downloads can infect devices.

title: Defense-in-Depth
content: Use MFA, least privilege, patching, email filtering, and continuous user awareness.
